1.name: hostile
1.description: Targets the current victim (usually the one with the most threat)

2.name: hostile second aggro
2.description: Targets the unit with the second most threat in the threat list

3.name: hostile last aggro
3.description: Targets the unit with the least threat in the threat list

4.name: hostile random
4.description: Targets a random unit from the threat list

5.name: hostile random not top
5.description: Targets a random unit from the threat list excluding the one with the most threat

6.name: action invoker
6.description: Targets the unit that caused the event; only for certain events only.

7.name: action invoker's owner
7.description: Targets unit who is responsible for Event to occur (only works for EVENT_T_AGGRO, EVENT_T_KILL, EVENT_T_DEATH, EVENT_T_SPELLHIT, EVENT_T_OOC_LOS, EVENT_T_RECEIVE_EMOTE, EVENT_T_RECEIVE_AI_EVENT)

8.name: hostile random player
8.description: Targets Random Player on The Threat List

9.name: hostile random not top player
9.description: Targets Any Random Player Except Top Threat

10.name: event sender
10.description: Creature who sent a received AIEvent - only triggered by EVENT_T_RECEIVE_AI_EVENT

12.name: event specific
12.description: Filled by specific event (works for EVENT_T_FRIENDLY_HP, EVENT_T_FRIENDLY_IS_CC, EVENT_T_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF)

13.name: player invoker
13.description: Player who initiated hostile contact with this npc

14.name: player tapped
14.description: Player who currently holds to score the kill credit from the npc

15.name: none
15.description: Default spell target - sets nullptr which should be most common spell fill

17.name: nearest aoe target
17.description: Checks for available near aoe targets by EffectRadiusIndex[0] for the spell used

18.name: hostile farthest away
18.description: Farthest away target, excluding melee range

1.name: critical health
1.description: Sender = Hurt Npc, Invoker = DamageDealer - Expected to be sent by 10% health

2.name: lost health
2.description: Sender = Hurt Npc, Invoker = DamageDealer - Expected to be sent by 50% health

3.name: lost some health
3.description: Sender = Hurt Npc, Invoker = DamageDealer - Expected to be sent by 90% health

5.name: custom eventai a
5.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)

6.name: custom eventai b
6.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)

7.name: got cced
7.description: Sender = CCed Npc, Invoker = Caster that CCed

8.name: custom eventai c
8.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)

9.name: custom eventai d
9.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)

10.name: custom eventai e
10.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)

11.name: custom eventai f
11.description: Sender = Npc that throws custom event, Invoker = TARGET_T_ACTION_INVOKER (if exists)
